name: Card After Card Demo
description:
-This Demo only features 7 cards.

Card After Card is a high-score game where you have rows of cards switching sides infront of you, the closer ones give less points and the ones far away give you more, on clicking on any card it will add saturation aswell as 1 extra point.

https://discord.gg/7dZgUeBtgz
